content:
Please join us for the 2021 Xarray User Forum at the Dask Distributed Summit on May 21, 4pm - 6pm UTC / 12pm - 2pm US/Eastern. This interdisciplinary event will bring together Xarray users from different scientific domains and Xarray developers.

The highlight of this forum will be presentations and discussions on (1) Xarray+Dask user stories from non-geoscience domains (2) updates on new and upcoming features of Xarray.

For the full program, and the list of speakers, please see
https://summit.dask.org/schedule/presentation/51/xarray-user-forum/

You can register for the Dask Distributed Summit at: https://summit.dask.org/tickets/

Deepak & Anderson

The highlight of this forum will be presentations and discussions on (1) Xarray+Dask user stories from non-geoscience domains (2)

For geo-science focused session, join us for the Pangeo workshop :grinning: on May 19, 6pm - 8pm UTC / 2pm - 4pm US/Mountain : https://summit.dask.org/schedule/presentation/1/pangeo/
Reminder that the Pangeo session is tomorrow at 12PM MT
Is paying for the summit a requirement? I can't seem to just register.
Yes. I think you have to pay. It is not expensive, though.
